thread.title: Five star customer service
thread.title_full: Five star customer service - Review of Archer Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Donna H
title: Five star customer service
text:
My stay at the Archer was fantastic. Evan, at the front desk, was very professional and more then happy to accommodate my requests.
The staff at the SKYBAR was top notch with great drinks and service from Katerina, Pedro, Aurele and Chuck. The view of the Empire State building is spectacular. A real NY experience.
The bed was very comfortable and the linens where crisp and fresh.
I will be back!
Room Tip: Ask for room with view of Empire State Building See more room tips
